title: 세이건의 작가 페이지
content:
[[include :scpko:theme:navla-style preset=11]]

[[module CSS]]

.fancyborder {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 2vw;
    border: 2vw solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    border-image: url("https://wanderers-library-ko.wikidot.com/local--files/component:theme/wl_border.png") 600 round;
    border-image-width: 6;
}
#page-title,
.meta-title {
    display: none;
}
}
[[/module]]
